Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.JSF_Hero_vs_Monster.main.Map

extends java.lang.Object
    Map.java - Used for representing the map as a string of characters.

    1.0 19/02-2015.
    Author:

        Parameters:

      • setTextureLocation

        public void setTextureLocation(java.lang.String[] texture,

      • moveTextureLocation

        public java.lang.String moveTextureLocation(java.awt.Point fromPoint,
                                            java.awt.Point toPoint)
        Move a texture from a given point to another point on the map. This will only work if no wall is in the way or fight is at the fromPoint. A result in the form of string will also be returned.
        Parameters:
        fromPoint - - This is from where the texture should be taken.
        toPoint - - This is to where the texture should be moved to.

      • getLinesFromFile

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLinesFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Return the lines from a specified file's path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - This must be a file's path and not a directories path.
